meta_description: What is the meaning of SKU in industrial maintenance? Learn why MRO SKUs differ from retail, how to structure them, and how to optimize spare parts inventory.
title: SKU Meaning for Maintenance Managers: Why Your Spare Parts Strategy is Failing Without It

hero_image.alt: Hero image for SKU Meaning for Maintenance Managers: Why Your Spare Parts Strategy is Failing Without It

image_prompt: A photo-realistic, cinematic shot inside a modern, clean industrial manufacturing facility or storeroom. In the foreground, a maintenance manager wearing a white hard hat, safety glasses, and a high-visibility vest is holding a tablet (back of tablet visible) and looking at a clearly labeled shelf of spare parts. The shelf contains industrial components like motors, gearboxes, and boxed bearings, all organized with clear barcodes and alphanumeric labels. In the background, out of focus, is a blurred production line with automated machinery. The lighting is bright and professional, emphasizing organization and technology. No text overlays.
